channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Smart Warming Mug Is Marked Down by $60
item.description: Keep your favorite liquids warm for hours with the discounted Ember Travel Mug 2+.

item.title: I spent a month living with a $430 AI pet, the Casio Moflin
item.description: Casio’s Moflin, a hamster-like robot pet, uses AI to develop a personality over time.

item.title: Sources: Multimodal AI startup Fal.ai already raised at $4B+ valuation
item.description: Fal.ai announced its previous round at a $1.5 billion valuation in July.

item.title: Google Fi to add AI-enhanced audio and RCS web messaging
item.description: The tech giant says calls will now use AI-enhanced audio to reduce background noise and improve voice clarity, even when speaking to someone on a land...

item.title: Sperm From Older Men Have More Genetic Mutations
item.description: Researchers confirmed that sperm accumulate mutations over the years, increasing the risk of transmitting diseases to offspring.

item.title: OpenAI’s Atlas Browser Takes Direct Aim at Google Chrome
item.description: The new ChatGPT-powered web browser is OpenAI’s boldest play yet to reinvent how people use the web.

item.title: The 39 Best Shows on Apple TV Right Now (November 2025)
item.description: Slow Horses, The Morning Show, and Platonic are among the best shows on Apple TV this month.
